name: src/chord-unit.js
ChordUnit
description:
Represents some data built around a specific chord.
Has a reference to the next ChordUnit in the progression, and the chord tones that will be used in melody generation.

params.name: chordTones
params.description: array of notes in the melody

params.name: next
params.description: the next ChordUnit in the chain.

name: src/constants.js
AcConstants
description: Constants used by the application.

properties.name: DEFAULT_LOWER_LIMIT
properties.description: Lower limit of main melody's range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: DEFAULT_UPPER_LIMIT
properties.description: Upper limit of main melody's range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: ACCOMPANIMENT_LOWER_LIMIT
properties.description: Lower limit of accompaniment range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: ACCOMPANIMENT_UPPER_LIMIT
properties.description: Upper limit of accompaniment range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: BASS_LOWER_LIMIT
properties.description: Lower limit of bassline's range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: BASS_UPPER_LIMIT
properties.description: Upper limit of bassline's range (pitch in scientific notation)

properties.name: NUM_GENERATIONS_LIMIT
properties.description: Limit on number of melody generation attempts (unused)

properties.name: NUM_MELODIES_LIMIT
properties.description: Limit on number of returned melodies

properties.name: instrumentData
properties.description: Data for the default instruments used by the app.

name: src/logic.js
Logic
description: Encapsulates data and musical logic to be used by the application

name: getChordDictionary
description: Returns all the chord types available for use.

return.description: chord types available for use

name: filterMelodyRange
description: Filters out melodies that have a range larger than an octave.

return.description: Returns false if the melody has a range larger than one octave. Returns true otherwise

name: filterRepetition
description:
Filters out melodies that are too repetitive. For our purposes, three of the same notes in a row would be too repetitive.
Assumes a melody with at least three notes.

return.description: Returns false if the melody is too repetitive

name: isValidText
description: Parses text, and determines if user input represents a valid note/chord.

return.description: a true value means the string can be used by the rest of the program.

name: convertAsciiAccidentalsToHtml
description: Converts ASCII accidentals to Unicode accidentals in HTML

return.description: text with Unicode accidentals in HTML

name: convertAsciiAccidentalsToText
description: Converts ASCII accidentals to Unicode accidentals

return.description: text with Unicode accidentals

name: convertAccidentalsToAscii
description: Converts Unicode accidentals to ASCII

return.description: text with ASCII accidentals

name: src/melody-data.js
MelodyData
description: Represents a melody and associated metadata.

params.name: melodyNotes
params.description: array of notes in the melody

name: getRange
description: Calculates the range of this melody.

return.description: Range of the melody (in semitones)

name: getSmoothness
description: Calculates the smoothness of this melody.

return.description: Range of the melody (in semitones)

name: src/melody.js
Melody
description: Submodule responsible for creating melodies from a given chord progression.

name: _getLowestNoteInRange
description: For a given note, find its lowest instance in the specified range.

return.description: an array of notes (written in scientific pitch)

name: _removePitchesFromChordTones
description: For a given array of chord tones, remove the specified pitches.

return.description: the remaining chord tones

name: buildSimpleAccompaniment
description: For a given MelodyData, get a simple accompaniment for it.

return.description: array of strings, each representing one or more notes to play under each melodic note.

name: buildBasicBassLine
description: For a given MelodyData, return a basic bass line consisting only of root notes.

return.description: array of strings, each one representing a bass note.

name: _getAllChordTones
description: For a given chord, get all the chord tones between the upper and lower limits.

return.description: an array of notes (written in scientific pitch)

name: _buildChordUnit
description: For a given chord symbol, creates a ChordUnit object

name: _buildMelodyData
description: For a given melody, creates a MelodyData object

name: _buildMelodyDataList
description: For a given chord progression and melody, generate a series of melodies that fit over the progression

params.name: options
params.description: if true, generated melodies will be sorted, with smoothest melodies coming first.

params.name: options.sort
params.description: if true, generated melodies will be sorted, with smoothest melodies coming first.

params.name: options.limit
params.description: limits the output to a set number.

return.description: a list of ChordUnit objects.

name: _buildChordUnitList
description: For a given chord progression, generate a series of melodies that fit over the progression

params.name: lowerLimit
params.description: lower limit (in scientific notation). Optional value.

params.name: upperLimit
params.description: upper limit (in scientific notation). Optional value.

return.description: a list of ChordUnit objects.

name: _buildSimpleMelodiesCore
description:
Recursive function that adds new notes to the previous notes passed into it.
On the first call of this function, melodyList should be null.

params.name: chordUnit
params.description: the ChordUnit for the next chord

params.name: options
params.description: if true, generated melodies will be filtered

params.name: options.filtered
params.description: if true, generated melodies will be filtered

return.description: a list of melodies. Each element is a string represeting a melody. Each melody string is written as a series of pitches delimited by a space.

name: buildAllMelodies
description: For a given chord progression, generate a series of melodies that fit over the progression.

return.description: an array of notes (written in scientific pitch)

name: buildRawMelodies
description: For a given chord progression, generate a series of melodies that fit over the progression.

return.description: an array of notes (written in scientific pitch)

name: buildSimpleMelodies
description:
For a given chord progression, generate a series of melodies that fit over the progression.
The melodies are sorted by smoothness, and are limited to the smoothest 100 melodies by default.

params.name: options.raw
params.description: if true, returns output as strings (default = false)

params.name: options.limit
params.description: if false, returns all the generated melodies, not just the top 100 (default = true)

params.name: options.filter
params.description: if false, returns melodies that are considered too "ugly" for the default process. (default = true)

return.description: an array of MelodyDatas

name: src/midi-player.js
MidiPlayer
description: Submodule responsible for playing audio on the browser.

emits.description: Emits this event when the audio player loads.

name: _midiCallback
description: Triggers the note playing for all instruments. Called for every MIDI event in the app.

name: _finishLoad
description: Completes the loading of this class. The "midiPlayerReady" eve

emits.description: Emits this event when the audio player successfully loads

name: playMelodySolo
description: Plays the given melody.

name: playMelodyWithAccompaniment
description: Plays the given melodies.

name: _playMelody
description: Actually plays the given melody

params.name: strMidi
params.description: MIDI data, as a DataURI string.

name: stopPlayback
description: Stops all playback

name: src/midi-writer.js
MidiWriter
description: Submodule responsible for generating MIDI files for future playback.

name: _buildMidi
description: Builds MIDI info for a note or chord

params.name: arrNumMidi
params.description: MIDI numbers for a set of pitches

name: _buildTrack
description: Builds a Track from a given chord.

return.description: a MidiWriter Track

name: buildMelodyMidi
description: Gets the MIDI data for a given melody.

return.description: MIDI data, as a DataURI string

name: buildMelodyMidiWithAccompaniment
description: Gets the MIDI data for a given melody, with accompaniment.

return.description: MIDI data, as a DataURI string.
